tagline: Get native macOS notifications when Claude Code needs your attention
description: Never miss when Claude Code finishes a task or needs your permission. This plugin sends native macOS notifications for key events during Claude Code sessions, perfect for long-running tasks or when working in other applications.
features: Native macOS notifications when Claude Code completes tasks
Alerts when Claude Code requests permission

prerequisites.name: Go 1.20+
prerequisites.description: Required for building the notification binary

instructions: Build the notification binary: `make build` or `go build -o bin/notify main.go`
The plugin will start working automatically once installed
